**Metabolic Englaciation** is a level 5 [Hexes](/Hexes "Hexes")/[Ice](/Ice_Magic "Ice Magic") spell that [slows](/Slow "Slow") down monsters in the caster's [line of sight](/Line_of_sight "Line of sight").

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Strategy](#Strategy)
- [3 History](#History)
- [4 References](#References)

## Useful Info

Applies the [slowed](/Slow "Slow") status effect for creatures in the caster's line of sight. The duration of this effect is dependent on [spell power](/Spell_power "Spell power") and inversely proportional to monster [HD](/HD "HD"); it does not check [willpower](/Willpower "Willpower"). Duration is doubled for [cold-blooded](/Cold-blooded "Cold-blooded") targets. [Cold resistant](/Cold_resistance "Cold resistance") and [stationary](/Stationary "Stationary") monsters are unaffected by this spell. Using this spell on an already slowed creature will increase its duration.

The slow effect will last for `3d(pow+1)/6 - HD/2 - 0.5` turns.[\[1\]](#cite_note-1) If this results in ≤ 0 turns, then the spell is resisted, otherwise it has a minimum of (1 + 1d4) turns. Cold-blooded creatures have their duration doubled *after* the turns > 0 check, meaning they aren't more likely to be slowed.

## Strategy

While this spell may not be as impressive as other Hexes, Metabolic Englaciation can still be valuable as a crowd-control spell. Even if you can't slow down the most dangerous monsters, you can disable whole packs of "mook" enemies, such as [vault guards](/Vault_guard "Vault guard") and [draconians](/List_of_draconians "List of draconians"). Unlike [Cause Fear](/Cause_Fear "Cause Fear"), Metabolic Englaciation checks HD instead of willpower.

High spellpower is vital for this spell's function; power increases the chance to slow, as well as the duration of the slow.

## History

- Prior to [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), Metabolic Englaciation didn't have a minimum duration.
- Prior to [0.27](/0.27 "0.27"), Metabolic Englaciation lasted for `3d(pow + 1) / 6 - 1d(HD) - 1` turns.
- Prior to [0.14](/0.14 "0.14"), Metabolic Englaciation was a level 6 Hexes/Ice spell, and had no effect on already slowed creatures.
- Prior to [0.10](/0.10 "0.10"), Metabolic Englaciation functioned as a mass [Ensorcelled Hibernation](/Ensorcelled_Hibernation "Ensorcelled Hibernation").

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [spl-monench.cc:40](https://github.com/crawl/crawl/blob/0.30.0/crawl-ref/source/spl-monench.cc#L40) (0.30.0)
